name: ENC File
summary: Learn about .ENC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: If your ENC file is encoded using a standard encoding format, you can decode it with a program that supports that encoding format.

If your ENC file is encoded using a proprietary encoding format, you may be able to open it with the program that created it. However, many ENC files are not meant to be opened by users. Instead, they contain encoded data that a program loads as needed.
